summary: Internal Bureau of Prisons email regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, indicating he was being removed from suicide watch and placed on psychological observation on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being discussed in the email, identified as #76318-054, who is being removed from suicide watch and placed on psychological observation.

connections.description: LT, as a forensic psychologist, is responsible for evaluating and monitoring Epstein's mental health status in the correctional facility.

events.title: Epstein removed from suicide watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was removed from suicide watch and stepped down to psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was removed from suicide watch on July 24, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Epstein was placed on psychological observation status after being removed from suicide watch.
The document is an internal Bureau of Prisons email marked as CONFIDENTIAL and containing sensitive information.
The email was sent by a forensic psychologist from the U.S. Public Health Service working with the Bureau of Prisons.
